title: Two-way Tables
question_text: Five statements about two-way tables are given below.  One is incorrect.  Which statement is incorrect?

choices.text: A two-way table can also be called a conditional table.
A two-way table can contain counts.
A two-way table can contain relative frequencies.
A two-way table can contain joint relative frequencies.
A two-way table is used to summarize two categorical variables.
